title: orderNotification
description: A notification initiated by the Seller to the Buyer providing subsequent status information on “Acknowledged” orders such as service delivery confirmation, error, and/or jeopardy messages.

objectType.description: The type of the object, orderNotification.

orderId.description: Unique identifier for the order that is generated by the Seller when the order is initially accepted via an API.

link.description: A self referencing link to the orderNotification.

buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the order.

sellerId.description: An organization that provides products and services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the order.

buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies a order within the buyer's enterprise.

buyerOrderVersion.description: The version number that the Buyer uses to refer to this particular version of the order.

projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

requestedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the customer's requested completion date for the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

expectedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller expects to complete the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

completionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller completed the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

billingAccountNumber.description: Identifies the Billing Account to use to bill the ordered products.

sellerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Seller uses to refer to this OVC.

sellerEvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Seller uses to refer to his EVC.

sellerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the Seller uses to refer to this UNI.

sellerEnniId.description: The circuit identifier that the Seller uses to refer to this ENNI.

buyerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this OVC.

buyerEvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this EVC.

buyerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access  Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this UNI.

buyerEnniId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner / Access Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this ENNI.

svlanId.description: The S-VLAN ID assigned by the Seller for this service or the first S-VLAN ID when a range is used.

svlanIdLast.description: The S-VLAN ID assigned by the Seller for this service when a range is used.
